name: ILL Space
description:
Welcome, Candidate.

You are aboard the Interstellar Longhaul Logistics capital trade nexus.

In 2298, humanity is expanding at a rate higher than ever. Resources are plentiful, but far away and extremely hard to extract. The discovery and utilization of quantum links has finaly enabled human race to traverse previously unfathomable distances.

The I.L.L. Trade and Command Nexus is the largest, most populated hub of the Terran Alliance of Corporations, a self-governed and militarized industrial mega-corp.

Here, Commanders are sent deep into space to set up outposts and mine asteroids for precious metals. These enterprises are extremely expensive and also come at a high-risk - not everyone makes it back. And, sometimes, those who do, speak of unimaginable cosmic horrors and utter destruction. What long was thought as a myth, as an anomaly in long range field scanners, has proven to be true.

Do YOU have what it takes to overcome the unknown?

_______

ILL Space is a survival space station simulation with elements of tower defense!

It is a game about building huge things in space and fighting off the alien disease! A real-time survival strategy.

It is also about huge explosions and fragile human existence in harsh, unfriendly environments - the vision of a future in space.

ILL Space is a simulation: build, research, mine, trade, expand and defend.
